skillTree.name: Bellower
skillTree.description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield and encouraging unbridled carnage.

skillTree.name: Sword Gnoblars
skillTree.description: A small handful of Gnoblars surround this Ogre Lord, their swords always ready to cut and carve.

skillTree.name: Lookout Gnoblars
skillTree.description: Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.

skillTree.name: Lucky Gnoblars
skillTree.description: It never hurts to keep your lucky Gnoblar with you, just in case.

skillTree.name: Greased Gnoblars
skillTree.description: Step 1: Grease up your Gnoblars! Step 2: Go faster!

skillTree.name: Sneaky Gnoblars
skillTree.description: You have to watch 'em, as there's no telling what malicious schemes those wickedly cunning Gnoblars might enact.

skillTree.name: Blessed by the Great Maw
skillTree.description: Puny magicks are nothing in the face of the Great Maw's endless hunger.

skillTree.name: Courageous
skillTree.description: In the eyes of the brave, danger gleams like sunshine.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Raised from a Pet
skillTree.description: Tabby has guarded and protected Katerina ever since the Sabretooth has been large enough and old enough to do so.

skillTree.name: Capacity for Violence
skillTree.description: Even before she grew up under the watchful eye of an Ogre Tyrant, Katerina had a remarkable capacity for violence entirely unbecoming a Bretonnian maiden.

skillTree.name: Gnoblar Ambush
skillTree.description: The Gnoblars of Katerina's tribe respect her capacity for violence, and her ability to lead them to treasure. And they love a good ambush.

ui_effects.description: Spawned unit fights in this battle only

skillTree.name: Fierce Mother
skillTree.description: The gnoblars of her tribe look up to her in all respects, even if they don't quite understand some of her more Bretonnian notions.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -50% for Gnoblars units
	(all units in army)

Recruit rank: +3 for Gnoblars units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Katerina's Raiders
skillTree.description: A master of exploiting others' weaknesses, Katerina and her Gnoblars are never where you expect them and always where they can get the most loot.

skillTree.name: Knows Where the Loot Is
skillTree.description: No matter where the gold is hidden, Tabby and Katerina can find it.

skillTree.name: Winnin' is Winnin'
skillTree.description: There's nothing more that Gnoblars like than a fight that's already being won.

ui_effects.description: Summons a unit of Gnoblar Trappers
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Boost Income
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Bretonnian Ogress
backgroundSkills.description: Katerina de Hansebourg is the daughter of a Bretonnian merchant, became the chieftain of Gnoblars in an Ogre tribe, and a fierce combatant and raider. She's also accompanied by a pet Sabretooth.

effects.description:
Income from raiding: +30%
	(all units in army)

Leadership: +8 for Gnoblars units
	(all units in army)

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
